items.title: Ask HN: Allow AI use during job interviews?
items.summary: Most of us use AI/LLMs for coding and other job related tasks, but job interviews are still done with pre AI ways/methods. 1. How should job interview process change to adapt this new world? 2. What is the value of asking leet code like questions anymore? 3. How to test if a candidate is good at using AI at work? 4. What else you think is important to think about regarding hiring process in age of AI? Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46350289 Points: 3 # Comments: 1

items.title: Show HN: Create Scrapers for Any Site with AI
items.summary: Hi! I'm Joe, and I'm working on Lection ( https://www.lection.app ). It's a Chrome extension that uses LLMs to build Python-based web scrapers. Instead of similar AI-based web scraping tools which are slowed down by using headless browsers or limited to scraping static sites, having the scraping live within your existing browser session simplifies all of this. You can take any of these scripts and run them on browsers in the cloud, and then retrieve the data via a webhook to get data on regular intervals. I found that AI agents are uniquely suited to web scraping as a task: retrieving information from the page, testing it, and iterating. I'd love to get your feedback and what you think the main limitations are! Comments URL: https://news.ycombinator.com/item?id=46349787 Points: 1 # Comments: 0
